resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/69839</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>69839</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-UL-id</catalog>
    <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120459</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:atlas.fri.uni-lj.si:trubar1:fizleti/120459</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>trubar1:fizleti/120459</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="sl">Ohlajanje pri izparevanju</string>
            <string language="en">Evaporative Cooling</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verdampfungskühlung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Refroidissement par évaporation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Refrigerar Evaporativo</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Raffreddamento per evaporazione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξατμιστική ψύξη</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Refrigeración por evaporación</string>
          </title>
          <language>sl</language>
          <description>
            <string language="sl">Posoda je ločena z membrano, ki jo lahko prestopijo le dovolj topli delci - prikaz izparevanja.</string>
            <string language="en">The container is split in half with special membrane  that causes that only particles with high enough temperature are able to pass it - visualization of evaporation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">fizlet</string>
            <string language="en">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">izparevanje</string>
            <string language="en">evaporation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="sl">kinetična teorija</string>
            <string language="en">kinetic theory</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Der Behälter wird zur Hälfte mit der speziellen
Membrane aufgespaltet, die, daß nur Partikel mit stark genügender 
Temperatur können, sie zu führen - Sichtbarmachung der Verdampfung 
verursacht.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le récipient est dédoublé dans la moitié avec
la membrane spéciale qui cause que seulement les particules avec haut
assez de température peuvent la passer - la visualisation de 
l'évaporation.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O recipiente é rachado ao meio com membrana 
especial que causa que somente as partículas com altamente bastante 
temperatura podem  a passar - o visualization da evaporação.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il contenitore è spaccato a metà con la 
membrana speciale che causa che soltanto le particelle con su 
abbastanza temperatura possono passarla - la visualizzazione di 
evaporazione.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Το εμπορευματοκιβώτιο είναι χωρισμένο στο μισό με την 
ειδική μεμβράνη που προκαλεί ότι μόνο τα μόρια με την αρκετά 
υψηλή θερμοκρασία είναι σε θέση να το περάσουν - απεικόνιση της 
εξάτμισης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">El envase está partido por la mitad con la 
membrana especial que causa que solamente las partículas con arriba 
bastante temperatura puedan pasarla - la visualización de la 
evaporación.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Verdampfung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">kinetische Theorie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">évaporation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">théorie cinétique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">evaporação</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">teoria cinética</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">evaporazione</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">teoria cinetica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξάτμιση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">κινητική θεωρία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">physlet</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">evaporación</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">teoría cinética</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
